title: TikTok Viral Challenge Finder
description: Find exploding TikTok challenges & viral hashtags before they peak. Real-time views + virality score. Perfect for creators & marketers.

niche.title: Niche / Keyword
niche.description: Keyword or topic to narrow down trending challenges (e.g., "dance", "fitness", "cooking", "GRWM"). Leave empty or delete to get global top trending challenges.

minViews.title: Minimum Estimated Views (7 days)
minViews.description: Only include challenges with at least this many estimated views in the past ~7 days. Higher = more proven virality.

maxResults.title: Max Challenges to Return
maxResults.description: How many of the hottest challenges you want in the final list.
